about_the_game:
This Special Ninjutsu DLC unlocks new Ninjutsu for your original ninja.

Harness the chakra of Three Tails and unleash a shockwave to blast away your enemies!

Content includes:
- Ninjutsu: Host Transformation: Three Tails (Defense Type)

*After downloading this content, open the game and navigate to the Add-Ons section in the Gift Box at the Inn inside the Hidden Leaf Village online lobby.
*This content is limited to Ninjutsu only. It does not include new VR Masters or Training Rank rewards.
detailed_description:

*This content is limited to Ninjutsu only. It does not include new VR Masters or Training Rank rewards.
